In the n[ame of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.]
The sheep, which are in the care of Buṭrus, the shepherd of the sons of ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad
collected together and correctly counted 229
quintal(s) pound(s)
We have slaughtered thereof 224, we realized 40 5
We delivered thereof 30 pounds for the workman of the tenure.
The deficit thereof was reported to Abû Ǧabala
and he brought us four fugitives. So we [re]stored them with the deficit to his debit.
